tasks.title: Reading
details: Focus: Why analog matters, basic semiconductor physics

tasks.title: Software Installation
details: Download and install LTspice XVII from analog.com/ltspice
Familiarize with: component placement, wiring, simulation commands

tasks.title: Lab Journal
details: Document: What you built, results, screenshots

tasks.title: GitHub Commit
details: Add file: day01_notes.md with today's notes
Commit message: "Day 1: Introduction and first simulation"

tasks.title: Video Lecture
details: Watch: Ali Hajimiri Caltech EE105 Lecture 3

tasks.title: LTspice Practice - MOSFET I-V Curves
details: Circuit: NMOS with V_GS=0.6V, sweep V_DS
Run and observe: Family of I-V curves

tasks.title: Analysis
details: Identify on plot: triode and saturation regions

tasks.title: Video Content Planning
details: Screen record: Simulation process (don't edit yet)

tasks.title: Deep Review
details: Create visual concept map: MOSFET operation
Self-quiz: Explain saturation condition without notes

tasks.title: Practice Problems
details: Focus on: Given W/L and V_GS, find I_D and g_m

tasks.title: Weekly Review Prep
details: Create summary sheet: Key equations and concepts
Identify weak areas for next week

tasks.title: Week 1 Summary in Notion
details: Topics covered: MOSFET structure, I-V, small-signal
Circuits built: (divider, I-V sweep, CS amp)

tasks.title: Review
details: Quiz yourself on g_m and r_o

tasks.title: Reading - Body Effect & λ
details: Key concepts: Body effect, λ parameter, r_o = 1/(λI_D)

tasks.title: Simulation - Output Resistance
details: Sweep V_DS in saturation, plot I_D vs V_DS

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Key finding: Longer channel → better current source

tasks.title: Reading - Single-Stage Amplifiers
details: Note trade-offs: Gain vs input/output impedance

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Create methodology: Specs → g_m → W/L → Verify

tasks.title: Build All Three Topologies
details: Measure: Voltage gain, Z_in, Z_out for each

tasks.title: Amplifier Selection Guide
details: Document decision flowchart: when to use each topology

tasks.title: Frequency Response Introduction
details: Simulate: CS amp with 5pF load capacitor

tasks.title: Comprehensive Review
details: Self-quiz: Design each amplifier type from memory

tasks.title: Design Challenge
details: Design CS amplifier: Gain=-15, BW>1MHz, Power<500µW

tasks.title: Major Project - Amplifier Library
details: CS amplifier (3 variants), CG amplifier (2), CD amplifier (2)
For each: Schematic, Symbol, Test bench, Performance table

tasks.title: Cadence Introduction
details: Follow basic tutorial: Create library, cell view, schematic
If no access: Practice advanced LTspice features

tasks.title: Video Editing
details: Edit Week 2 video: Amplifier Topologies Compared

tasks.title: Content Publishing
details: Upload both videos to YouTube with descriptions and tags

tasks.title: Reading - Current Mirrors
details: Key concepts: Why current mirrors, basic operation, current matching

tasks.title: First Current Mirror Simulation
details: Build basic NMOS current mirror in LTspice
Tests: .op analysis, DC sweep V_out, measure r_o

tasks.title: Analysis & Documentation
details: Note: Simple mirror has moderate r_o

tasks.title: Review
details: Quiz: Draw current mirror from memory

tasks.title: Reading - Cascode Mirror
details: Trade-off: High r_out vs headroom cost

tasks.title: Monte Carlo Simulation
details: Test effect of L on matching

tasks.title: Analysis
details: Key finding: Longer L → better matching
Design rule: Use L ≥ 2µm for critical mirrors

tasks.title: Current Mirror Library
details: Create LTspice symbols: Simple NMOS/PMOS, Cascode NMOS/PMOS

tasks.title: Cadence Practice
details: Rebuild current mirror in Cadence Virtuoso

tasks.title: Portfolio & Community
details: Reddit post on precision current source

tasks.title: Video Publishing
details: Create playlist: Analog IC Design Journey

tasks.title: First Differential Pair Simulation
details: Build diff pair with resistive load

tasks.title: Detailed Analysis
details: Create results table comparing hand calc vs simulation

tasks.title: Tail Current Source Effect
details: Compare: Resistor, simple mirror, cascode tail

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Design rule: Use cascode tail for CMRR > 80dB

tasks.title: Reading - Active Load
details: Key: Why active load >> resistive load

tasks.title: Diff Pair with Active Load
details: Build with PMOS current mirror load
Understand trade-off: Higher gain, reduced swing

tasks.title: Review Week 4
details: Create summary sheet on diff pairs

tasks.title: Comprehensive Review
details: Self-quiz: Draw diff pair with active load from memory

tasks.title: Diff Pair Library Creation
details: Create LTspice symbols for resistive, active load, cascode tail variants

tasks.title: Major Project - High-Performance Diff Amp
details: Full characterization: DC, AC, Transient, Monte Carlo

tasks.title: Week 5 Detailed Planning
details: Read ahead: Razavi CMOS IC Ch 9.1-9.2

tasks.title: Reading - Op-Amp Introduction
details: Key specs: DC gain, GBW, Phase margin, Slew rate

tasks.title: Reading - Input Stage Design
details: Design equations for g_m and first stage gain

tasks.title: Design First Stage
details: Input diff pair with active load and cascode tail

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Lab journal: Op-Amp First Stage Design

tasks.title: Reading - Second Stage Design
details: CS second stage for additional gain

tasks.title: Design Second Stage
details: Add M6 (CS amp) and M7 (PMOS load)

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Note: Stability problem to solve tomorrow

tasks.title: Reading - Miller Compensation
details: Key: Pole-splitting, C_c, R_z, RHP zero

tasks.title: Implement Miller Compensation
details: Add C_c and R_z to op-amp

tasks.title: Documentation
details: Key insight: Miller cap creates single-pole response

tasks.title: Complete Characterization
details: Measure: DC Gain, GBW, PM, Slew Rate, Settling, CMRR, PSRR

tasks.title: Op-Amp Report (Portfolio #3)
details: Complete characterization report - major portfolio piece
